description: This file serves as the command-line interface for a universal project initializer. It parses command line arguments, constructs project configurations, and manages the project creation process, including invoking templates and outputting JSON results.

classes.name: ProjectConfig
classes.description: Holds configuration details for the project to be initialized, constructed from CLI arguments.

classes.name: ProjectType
classes.description: Represents the type of project, with a method 'from_string' to parse string identifiers.

classes.name: TemplateInitInfo
classes.description: Contains various commands and configurations for setting up the project templates.

classes.name: ProjectInitializer
classes.description: Orchestrates the creation and initialization of the project based on the configuration and templates.

methods.name: Dict[str,Any] parse_parameters(params_str: str)
methods.description: Parses a comma-separated key=value string into a dictionary with type conversions.

methods.name: ProjectConfig create_project_config(args)
methods.description: Constructs a ProjectConfig object from CLI arguments.

methods.name: str make_path_absolute(path: str, base_path: Path)
methods.description: Converts relative paths to absolute paths, based on a given base directory.

methods.name: dict template_init_info_to_dict(init_info: TemplateInitInfo, project_path: Path)
methods.description: Converts a TemplateInitInfo object into a dictionary with absolute paths for serialization.

methods.name: output_json(success: bool, message: str, template_info: TemplateInitInfo = None, project_path: Path = None)
methods.description: Outputs the result of the project initialization as a formatted JSON string.

methods.name: main()
methods.description: Main function that parses arguments, initializes the project, and handles exceptions.

ctags.name: output_json
ctags.pattern: /^def output_json(success: bool, message: str, template_info: TemplateInitInfo = None, project_pat/
ctags.signature: (success: bool, message: str, template_info: TemplateInitInfo = None, project_path: Path = None)
